2011-11-10

Quick as rainbows

Lauren Laverne's BBC 6Music morning show had a Rainbow "people's playlist" - here's what they didn't play but could/should have...

Red Head Walking - Beat Happening

Orange Zero - Movietone

Big Yellow Taxi - Joni Mitchell

Green - Throwing Muses
(nice video of Tanya doing it in 2007)

Blue Thunder - Galaxie 500 (obv)

Mood Indigo - Thelonious Monk

The Violet Hour - The Clientele
Argh! No sign of The Violet Hour (the track) on YouTube so here's Lamplight (from The Violet Hour (the album))
